item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Evil Needle joins the show to discuss his two latest releases. Plus tunes from Chester Watson, Hell'z OWN, and more.

item.title: Bandcamp Selects
item.description: Alabaster DePlume stops by to talk about his new album "A Blade Because A Blade Is Whole".

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Christian Mistress vocalist Christine Davis stops by to talk about the band's scorching new album, their first in 10 years.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Mereba joins the show to discuss her new album, "The Breeze Grew A Fire". Plus tunes from Foreign Exchange, Samplelov, & more.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Brandon Hill from the Portland hardcore punk/crossover band Stress Test joins the show to chat about their self-titled debut album.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: With special guests Ibex Band and Florence Adooni.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Brother Ali joins the show to discuss his new release, "Satisfied Soul". Plus tunes from Larry June & Calvin Black.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Cristina Scabbia from Lacuna Coil chats about re-recording 'Comalies' and the making of the band's new LP, 'Sleepless Empire.'

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Neneh Cherry and James Brandon Lewis pay tribute to Marshall Allen, plus up-and-comers Celine Dessberg and Nicole McCabe.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Goya Gumbani discusses his upcoming LP, "Warlord of the Weejuns". Plus tunes from Wavy Bagels & JPEGMAFIA.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Confucius MC and Bastien Keb stop by to talk about their new album.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Domino Monet and Justin Kaye from the hard-rocking Portland band Time Rift join the show to talk about their new album.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Damon Locks talks about his latest Intl Anthem LP and Matthew David drops a Leaving comp for LA fire victims.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Apollo Brown discusses his new album with CRIMEAPPLE "This, Is Not That". Plus tunes from André DeSaint & Casual.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Tunng reflect on their 8th album and 2 decades of making electronic folk, plus new Lonnie Holley, Yukimi, MIKE, and more!

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Ash Moore and Dan Bulford from the rising UK death metal band Mutagenic Host stop by to chat about their killer debut LP.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: New jams and new faces for '25, plus Voision Xi's shapeshifting Shanghai sound and Toronto's mighty Local Dish label.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: For the first episode of 2025, Skyzoo joins to discuss "Keep Me Company." Plus tunes from Taymon, Vic Spencer, & more.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: The Gates of Slumber are back, after a litany of tragedies and a 13-year hiatus. The Indiana band's frontman Karl Simon joins the show.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Nubya Garcia and Gilles Peterson guest, plus cameos from Zacchae'us Paul, TamTam, Momo, J.A. Bright, Galliano and Ari Tsugi.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: We close out '24 with Common discussing his recent release, "The Auditorium Vol. 1". Plus Skyzoo, TONA, Wahid & more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Best of 2024 part 1! Top tunes from around the world, plus chats with Joy Guidry, Joe Armon-Jones, and Reyna Tropical.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Genital Shame's Erin Dawson joins a supersized year-end edition of the show, celebrating the best metal of 2024.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Crazy P are in the studio to discuss their new record ‘Any Signs Of Love’.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Ohbliv joins the show to discuss his recent release, "Slack". Plus new tunes from Denzel Curry, Thurz, Apollo Brown & more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Jeff Parker chats about his new LP, the LA scene, and faves from 2024. Plus new [KSR] & Konny Kon, WAIWHAI, and Echolalia.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Aaren Pantke from Molder chats about the band's latest sonic flesh-ripper, plus new death metal by Kruelty, Emasculator, and more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Rogê calls in from his hometown of Rio De Janeiro, and disco don Tom Noble walks us through his LP 15 years in the making.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Celebrating 100 episodes, ELUCID discusses his REVELATOR LP. Plus new DIBIASE, Mother Nature, Kahj & Versâam, and more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Anaiis chats about recording with Sessa and Luedji Luna. Plus new BADBADNOTGOOD & Tim Bernardes, Silvan Strauss, and L'Eclair.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Jim Mutilator, a founding father of Hellenic black metal, stops by to talk Rotting Christ, Varathron, and his new band, Yoth Iria.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Joshua Idehen talks music, mums, and playing for royalty, plus new Herbert, ARTU, Felipe Gordon, Cleo Sol, and more.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: The great Hemlock Ernst discusses his new LP with Icky Reels. Plus tracks from NanaBcool, Flying Lotus, Sa-Roc, & more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Shigeto chats about Detroit, resilience, and making his collaborative new LP. Plus new Sade, Last Poets, and Lenna Bahule.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Nina Saeidi and Shem Lucas from the UK band Lowen join the show to discuss their new album and recommend some horror films.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Seun Kuti talks about the new Egpyt 80 LP, plus an exclusive chat with Thandii, and DJ Norsicaa's deep dig!

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Oklahoma City's Jabee talks about his latest. Plus, fresh cuts from Julius Myth, Oliver the 2nd, Silas Short, and more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Danish duo Svaneborg Kardyb and harp-wielding Marysia Osu guest, plus new Rogê, Kokoroko, Jeff Parker, tunng, and Ganavya.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: For the Metal Show's 100th episode, host Brad Sanders talks about the show's history and interviews Undeath frontman Alexander Jones.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Super selector Tina Edwards drops a cross-cultural soundclash featuring the Sweden-meets-Senegal duo of Annarella & Django.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Dive into the latest from NYC’s Phiik & Lungs. Plus, new music from Wiseboy Jeremy, Greg Cypher, MERCURY, and more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Lex Amor stops by to talk about her musical beginnings, collaboration and her fantastic new LP ‘Forward Ever’.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Unto Others frontman Gabriel Franco chats about the band's devilishly catchy new LP and the vagaries of the music industry.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Bass-wielding Anna Butterss, LA vocalist Sharada Shashidhar, and the duo Kit Sebastian guest in this week's jam-packed show.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: Awon & Phoniks converse about their new release, "Golden Era 2." Plus new tracks by Lex Amor, Cappo, Pep Love, & more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: New music from Brazil to the South China Sea, plus Dave Guy dips into his NY upbringing and Photay is inspired by nature.

item.title: The Metal Show
item.description: Cammie and Dobber Beverly from the Houston progressive metal band Oceans of Slumber talk about their towering new album.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Allysha Joy and Pale Jay celebrate soulful album releases, plus new tunes by Thandii, Ezra Collective, and Mulatu Astatke.

item.title: The Hip Hop Show
item.description: KeiyaA joins the show to discuss her re-release of the album "Forever, Ya Girl". Plus features from Baro, Eligh, Demae, & more.

item.title: Bandcamp Weekly
item.description: Andy Hay stops by to talk about his album Polaris
